mapper.sql: id, name, cloud_type_id, cloud_components_id, type, description, create_time, update_time, operator, deleted
mapper.select: SELECT count( 1 ) FROM template WHERE NAME = #{req.name} AND id !=#{req.id}
select count(1) from template where name=#{name}
SELECT id FROM template WHERE cloud_service_id = #{req.cloudServiceId} AND cloud_components_id =#{req.cloudComponentsId}
mapper.insert: insert into template (id, name, cloud_type_id, cloud_components_id, type, description, create_time, update_time, operator, deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloudTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cloudComponentsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update template
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cloud_type_id = #{cloudTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cloud_components_id = #{cloudComponentsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
